alert.note: Alert for Bracken; Mason; Robertson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 27 at 11:58AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN MASON...ROBERTSON AND CENTRAL BRACKEN COUNTIES THROUGH 1230 PM EDT... At 1157 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Brooksville, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 35 mph and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Brooksville, Mount Olivet, Germantown, Minerva, US Route 62 at State Route 875, Abigail, Woolcutt, Milford, Stonewall, Parina, Powersville, Santa Fe, Lowell, Petra, Chatham, Tuckahoe, US Route 62 at State Route 616, Aa Highway at State Route 19, and Hittville. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
